DataSource.Query: SELECT DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY orders.order_id) AS "S No", orders.order_id as "Invoice Id", customers.customer_name, orders.expected_delivery_date as "delivery date", sum(order_details.price * order_details.quantity) as "Invoice", orders.terms, ' ' as "Comments" FROM sales.orders JOIN inventory.customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN sales.order_details ON orders.order_id = order_details.order_id WHERE orders.office_id = @OfficeId and orders.cancelled = false AND orders.expected_delivery_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date group by orders.order_id, customers.customer_name, orders.expected_delivery_date,orders.terms order by orders.order_id;
